TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public interface auto ansi abstract ActionBar/ITabListener implements class Android.Runtime.IJavaObject, class System.IDisposable
type ActionBar.ITabListener = interface interface IJavaObject interface IDisposable

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("This class is obsoleted in this android platform")

Docs.summary: Callback interface invoked when a tab is focused, unfocused, added, or removed.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: public void OnTabReselected (Android.App.ActionBar.Tab tab, Android.App.FragmentTransaction ft);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnTabReselected(class Android.App.ActionBar/Tab tab, class Android.App.FragmentTransaction ft) cil managed
abstract member OnTabReselected : Android.App.ActionBar.Tab * Android.App.FragmentTransaction -> unit

Docs.param: A for queuing fragment operations to execute once this method returns. This FragmentTransaction does not support being added to the back stack.
Docs.summary: Called when a tab that is already selected is chosen again by the user.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: public void OnTabSelected (Android.App.ActionBar.Tab tab, Android.App.FragmentTransaction ft);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnTabSelected(class Android.App.ActionBar/Tab tab, class Android.App.FragmentTransaction ft) cil managed
abstract member OnTabSelected : Android.App.ActionBar.Tab * Android.App.FragmentTransaction -> unit

Docs.param: A for queuing fragment operations to execute during a tab switch. The previous tab's unselect and this tab's select will be executed in a single transaction. This FragmentTransaction does not support being added to the back stack.
Docs.summary: Called when a tab enters the selected state.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: public void OnTabUnselected (Android.App.ActionBar.Tab tab, Android.App.FragmentTransaction ft);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnTabUnselected(class Android.App.ActionBar/Tab tab, class Android.App.FragmentTransaction ft) cil managed
abstract member OnTabUnselected : Android.App.ActionBar.Tab * Android.App.FragmentTransaction -> unit

Docs.param: A for queuing fragment operations to execute during a tab switch. This tab's unselect and the newly selected tab's select will be executed in a single transaction. This FragmentTransaction does not support being added to the back stack.
Docs.summary: Called when a tab exits the selected state.
